channel.title: Trouble adding stats to torva,virtus and pernix [PI]
channel.description:
Hello
every time i try to add stats to torva,virtus and pernix, i get this error when i RUN the server not when i compile it
error: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "160 4" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:65) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:492) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:527) at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:383) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:33) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:63) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
also when i search for item.cfg to edit the stats, i get two item.cfg which one should i pick
thank you

item.title: Trouble adding stats to torva,virtus and pernix [PI]
item.dc:creator: @pkcrown pkcrown
item.description:
@pkcrown wrote:

Hello

every time i try to add stats to torva,virtus and pernix, i get this error when i RUN the server not when i compile it

error:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "160 4" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:65) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:492) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:527) at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:383) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:33) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:63) Press any key to continue . . .

also when i search for item.cfg to edit the stats, i get two item.cfg
which one should i pick

thank you
